name: SPACE RAIDER (Jonathan Delmonico)
description:
SPACE RAIDER is an arcade-inspired retro space shooter. Blast alien spaceships and survive for as long as you can!

Created entirely by Jonathan Delmonico

Game made with Unity: https://unity3d.com/

Art made with Piskel: https://www.piskelapp.com/

Sound effects made with Bfxr: https://www.bfxr.net/

Music made with BeepBox: https://www.beepbox.co/
